articles.title: England vs. Denmark - Football Match Report - July 7, 2021 - ESPN
articles.description: Get a report of the England vs. Denmark 2020 European Championship, Semifinals football match.
articles.content:
Harry Kane netted an extra-time goal as England beat Denmark 2-1 on Wednesday to advance to the 2020 European Championship final against Italy.
In the first period of extra time, Kane knocked in the… [+3381 chars]

articles.title: EU: Fully vaccinated persons allowed entry in principle - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: Anyone who has received full doses of Covid-19 vaccines authorised by member countries are allowed entry, says the European Union (EU).
articles.content:

articles.title: Controversial penalty sees England down Denmark in extra time to reach Euro 2020 final against Italy - The World Game
articles.description: England reached their first European Championship final as an extra-time goal from Harry Kane sealed a 2-1 win over Denmark at Wembley Stadium on Thursday (AEST).
articles.content: The Three Lions had lost their only previous two semi-finals in the competition against Yugoslavia in 1968 and Germany in 1996 but Kane stroked home after his initial penalty had been saved by Kasper… [+3629 chars]
